law.catch_line: A board of directors shall govern the district corporation....

text.section: A board of directors shall govern the district corporation.

section.section: Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, the board of a district corporation consists of five members appointed by the members of the district.
Appointment procedures shall be provided in the local law establishing the district.

text.section: From among its members, the board shall elect a chair and other officers.

section.section: Three voting members of the board are a quorum.
The board may act on a resolution only by the affirmative vote of at least three voting members.

text.section:
A member of the board:
may not receive compensation as a member of the board; but
shall be reimbursed for expenses incurred in performing the member's duties.
The board shall exercise its powers by resolution.
